mapper.select: select user_pw from User where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into QnA(user_id, qa_title, qa_content, qa_regDate, qa_type, com_num) values (#{user_id}, #{qa_title}, #{qa_content}, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') , #{qa_type}, #{com_num})
mapper.select: select * from QnA where qa_type like "%q%" order by qa_num desc limit #{pageStart}, #{amount}
mapper.update: update QnA set qa_title = #{qa_title} , qa_content = #{qa_content} where qa_num = #{qa_num}
mapper.select: select * from jobpostinglist j left join company c on j.com_num = c.com_num order by jpl_num desc

select * from jobpostinglist where jpl_locationSi like #{jpl_locationSi} and jpl_locationSi like #{inputSearch} and jpl_locationGu like #{jpl_locationGu} and jpl_locationGu like #{inputSearch} and jpl_duty like #{jpl_duty} and jpl_duty like #{inputSearch} and jpl_workHistory like #{jpl_workHistory} and jpl_workHistory like #{inputSearch} and jpl_education like #{jpl_education} and jpl_education like #{inputSearch} and jpl_salary like #{jpl_salary} and jpl_salary like #{inputSearch} and jpl_certificate like #{jpl_certificate} and jpl_certificate like #{inputSearch} and jpl_conditions like #{jpl_conditions} and jpl_conditions like #{inputSearch} and jpl_workForm like #{jpl_workForm} and jpl_workForm like #{inputSearch}
mapper.insert: insert into ResumeList (user_id, res_title, res_content, res_regDate, res_picName, res_picPath, res_picUuid, res_name, res_email, res_phone, res_address, res_birth) values (#{user_id}, #{res_title}, #{res_content}, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), #{res_picName}, #{res_picPath}, #{res_picUuid}, #{res_name}, #{res_email}, #{res_phone}, #{res_address}, #{res_birth})

insert into WorkExperiences (res_num, user_id, we_company, we_department, we_position, we_job, we_emplDate, we_departureDate, we_salary) values (#{res_num}, #{user_id}, #{we_company}, #{we_department}, #{we_position}, #{we_job}, #{we_emplDate}, #{we_departureDate}, #{we_salary})
